name: Accessories Master — Protect & Retouch
description: Combined from all 11 accessories category prompts. Protect face and existing accessories, retouch skin only.
prompt: Edit the uploaded photo — professional editorial retouch for beauty/fashion portfolio. PRESERVE: Face identity 100% identical — facial structure, proportions, eyes, nose, lips, jawline, expression, age, skin tone unchanged. No changes to any facial feature. EYELASHES: Exact original length, curl, density, direction — no modification, no mascara effect, no volume change. Pixel-identical. EYEBROWS: Exact original shape, color, arch, thickness, density — no changes. Pixel-identical. LIPS: Unchanged — no color, shape, or texture modification. HAIR: Maintain original structure, color, texture. Enhance shine through lighting only. MAKEUP: Unchanged — preserve all existing application. ACCESSORIES/JEWELRY: If present — preserve exactly as worn. Proper light reflections on metallic surfaces. OUTFIT: If present — preserve fabric texture, color, draping. SKIN: Ultra-detailed natural texture — visible pores, microtexture, realistic skin depth. Professional subtle retouch — remove only minor blemishes. Healthy even skin tone, radiant editorial glow. No over-smoothing, no airbrushing, no plastic effect. Hydrated dewy finish. High-shine editorial glow on high points. Décolleté, neck, and shoulder skin: even tone, matching face. BACKGROUND: Rich deep burgundy-to-black gradient with soft studio light bloom — luxury fashion editorial atmosphere. Subtle fabric-like texture in the far background suggesting draped velvet. Feels like a Cartier or Bulgari jewelry campaign. LIGHTING: High-contrast editorial studio lighting. Sculptural highlights on cheekbones, temples, shoulders. Strong rim/backlight from behind for depth and sculpted volume. Catch-light reflections on jewelry and fabric surfaces. QUALITY: Preserve original color correction, no filters. Ultra-photorealistic fashion photography. Vogue-level editorial finish. Sharp focus. 8K quality. Original dimensions — do not crop or resize.
